descriptions.dashboard: Your mission control center for awesome. 🚀
descriptions.projects(M): Tame those giant projects, one step at a time. 🦄

descriptions.todoList: Never forget to-do again (except maybe laundry). 📝
descriptions.calendar: Don't be late for your date with destiny (or the dentist). 📅

descriptions.codeTime: See how much coding magic you make happen. 👾
descriptions.photos: Memories so vivid, they'll practically jump off the screen. 📸
descriptions.music: Your personal soundtrack for life's greatest moments. 🎶
descriptions.repositories: Your code, your projects, your world. 🌎
descriptions.pomodoroTimer: Work like a boss with laser focus breaks. 🍅
descriptions.flashcards: Learn stuff fast and remember it forever (or at least until next Tuesday). 🧠
descriptions.notes: Digital sticky notes that never fall off the fridge. 📝
descriptions.booksLibrary: Your personal library, minus the late fees. 📚
descriptions.wishList: Dream big and plan to make it happen. ✨
descriptions.contacts: Stay connected with your favourite people (even the ones who never text back). 📱
descriptions.passwords: Keep your secrets safe, even from yourself (sometimes).
descriptions.personalization: Make it yours! Because who wants a boring organizer? 🎨
descriptions.dataBackup: Your digital safety net, because stuff happens. 🪂

descriptions.serverStatus: Keep your server healthy, happy, and humming. 🩺
descriptions.changeLog: Track the development progress, one change at a time. 📈
descriptions.about: The story behind how this project came to be. 📖
descriptions.journal: Your personal journal, for your eyes only. 📔
descriptions.achievements: Celebrate your wins, big and small. 🏆
descriptions.dNSRecords: No need to login to CPanel, manage your DNS records here. 🌐
descriptions.mailInbox: Manage your email inbox, all in one place. 📧
descriptions.blogPosts: Writing and sharing your thoughts with the world. 📝
